alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Irwin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 3:59PM EDT until June 03 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Irwin County in south central Georgia... Central Ben Hill County in south central Georgia... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 358 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mystic, or 7 miles west of Ocilla, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ocilla, Mystic, Lulaville, Waterloo, Pinetta, Irwinville, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Irwinville Airport, Bowens Mill, Arp, Abba and Queensland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
